channel.title: Rsync on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Rsync on TLDRBins

item.title: Rsync
item.description: General # List root directories ('/') rsync --list-only -av rsync://<TARGET>/ $ rsync --list-only -av rsync://10.10.64.45/ httpd web backup # List root directories ('/') with ipv6 rsync --list-only -av rsync://[<TARGET_IPV6>]:8730/ # List sub-directories rsync --list-only -av rsync://<TARGET>/<DIR>/ $ rsync --list-only -av rsync://10.10.64.45/httpd/ receiving incremental file list drwxr-xr-x 4,096 2023/04/20 19:50:04 . drwxr-xr-x 4,096 2023/04/20 20:13:22 db -rw-r--r-- 12,288 2023/04/20 19:50:42 db/site.db drwxr-xr-x 4,096 2023/04/20 19:50:50 migrate drwxr-xr-x 4,096 2023/04/20 20:13:15 www -rw-r--r-- 1,722 2023/04/20 20:02:54 www/dashboard.
